title: WEB DESIGN- Can CSS be used to provide frame designs?
content:
Can CSS be used to provide frame designs? I was using frameset but my IT guy told me to use CSS instead. How do I do that? Thanks

 [‹ OpenType and Word 2003](http://web.archive.org/web/20080204005518/http:/www.typophile.com/node/17059 "Go to previous forum topic") [hinting and metrics problem ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080204005518/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40669 "Go to next forum topic")
author: creative_designs_ca

comments.content: See a general overview information at [A List Apart](http://web.archive.org/web/20080204005518/http:/www.alistapart.com/articles/outsidethegrid).

Frames are to load multiple web pages into one web browser viewport. CSS is to style and layout content on a particular web page.

So, the answer really depends on what, specifically, you are trying to accomplish.
